Have you tried using another SMTP like gmail or O365?

TextBody:
Hi Vatsal,

Flaviu is on leave until Monday and until then I will try to assist you, unless you prefer waiting for Flaviu to return on Monday.
There is no reason for our server to block any SMTP servers unless you are using a relay instead of an SMTP server and are hosted by us, in which case port 25 is not open due to security reasons.
Can you share a screenshot of the SMTP settings?

Thank you,
Eduard Nut
Technical Support Engineer

Endpoint Protector now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
CoSoSys Ltd
www.endpointprotector.com
